nodes.text: Oratay slurry was a type of drink enjoyed by members of the Bith species. An elderly Bith couple living in the city of Myrra on the planet Akiva enjoyed slurping a cylinder of oratay slurry together on their rooftop on the morning of the Rebellion on Akiva. When an Imperial TIE/ln space superiority starfighter flew overhead, the couple dropped their drinks and began yelling at the starfighter, firing blaster bolts at it in protest of the Imperial presence on Akiva.
Oratay slurry first appeared in the novel Aftermath, which was written by Chuck Wendig and released in 2015.
